column5: Has anyone been through pigeon river crossing lately? Just wondering what the average waiting time has been. I'm going that way in 2 weeks. Let me know. Thanks
Not this year. Normally a quite fast go-through. Last year had a long line going in to Canada in july, officials interviewing down the line before getting to the crossing. Bill

We crossed a few weeks back. Going into Canada about 3PM on a Friday and coming back to US on Saturday about 10AM. Going in took about 15 minutes but coming back at US the line was out to the bridge but took about 40 minutes. Enjoy
